description: Shows ASP.NET metrics from OpenTelemetry NuGet

targets.expr:
topk(10,
  sum by (http_route, http_request_method, method_route) (
    label_join(max_over_time(http_server_request_duration_seconds_count{job="api", instance="investment_api:8080", http_route!=""}[$__rate_interval]), "method_route", " ", "http_request_method", "http_route")
  ))

title: ASP.NET OTEL Metrics
